items.sentence: Mr. Jackson caught Tom drinking on school property.
Tom drinks at least three cups of coffee every day.
If it hadn't been for your help, I would've failed.
The COVID-19 pandemic turned our world upside down.
We won't make any progress with just the two of us.
I don't know when Tom will be coming to pick me up.
Would you mind translating this into French for me?
I've begun to have doubts that that'll ever happen.
I was going to do that, but I never got the chance.
I want to watch either a comedy or an action movie.
